head.citation-title: Design of visual monitoring platform for special posture correction in police law enforcement skills teaching
head.abstracts: Â© 2019 Association for Computing Machinery.In order to improve the quality of police training, a visual monitoring platform for special posture correction in police law enforcement skills teaching is designed. The platform consists of visual monitoring module and special posture calibration module. The visual monitoring module is responsible for collecting, quantifying and transmitting special posture data. The MFC monitoring architecture, data transmission communication instruction structure, main hardware connection mode and high-order low-pass filtering method of data in the module are discussed. Special posture calibration module is used to receive special posture quantitative data transmitted by visual monitoring module. It uses Processing language to establish GUI optimal data settlement space, completes the transformation of special posture quantitative data to Euler angle by quaternion settlement method, determines whether special posture needs to be calibrated according to Euler angle determination rules, and marks the correction point. The experimental results show that the filtering effect of the designed platform is good and the monitoring error is small.
